sourceMeaningMnemonic: This is a <radical>gold</radical> <radical>roof</radical>, <radical>correct</radical>? It's important to <kanji>lock</kanji> it up, then.
meaningInfo: It's only natural that you'd want to lock a gold roof so nobody can steal it.
readingMnemonic: The person who <kanji>lock</kanji>ed the gold roof was <reading>Jou</reading>rm (<ja>じょう</ja>).
readingInfo: He's the big farmhand who turned out to be an undercover Viking in your town, only to pillage and destroy everything. Under the gold roof is where he locked up all your village's valuables, after wiping you all out.
